
# bash

## Arch Package

* [bash](https://archlinux.org/packages/core/x86_64/bash/)
* [bash-completion](https://archlinux.org/packages/extra/any/bash-completion/)


## Howto


### install

``` sh
$ ./install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make install
```


### package-install

``` sh
$ ./package-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make package-install
```


### config-install

``` sh
$ ./config-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make config-install
```
